docs.snippet: The company last year secured a 12-year deal to carry the British Open. But the event is the least-viewed major, and some top players have bowed out the Rio Games, another NBC broadcast....
docs.lead_paragraph: The company last year secured a 12-year deal to carry the British Open. But the event is the least-viewed major, and some top players have bowed out the Rio Games, another NBC broadcast.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column holds that NBC and Golf Channel will likely see ratings increase when networks broadcast 2016 British Open for first time, despite fact that it is least-viewed major; notes decision of several top golfers to skip Rio Olympics, which will also be broadcast by NBC.

headline.main: NBC Has the Stars, if Not at the Olympics
headline.print_headline: NBC Has the Stars, if Not at the Olympics

docs.snippet: Katie Uhlaender finished fourth at the Sochi Games, behind Elena Nikitina, who was among the Russian athletes said to be part of a government-run doping program....
docs.lead_paragraph: Katie Uhlaender finished fourth at the Sochi Games, behind Elena Nikitina, who was among the Russian athletes said to be part of a government-run doping program.
docs.abstract: American skeleton racer Katie Uhlaender, who finished fourth at 2014 Olympica behind Elena Nikitina, who is among Russian athletes said to be part of government-run doping program, is anxiously awaiting results of inquiry into scandal; is fighting  to keep her focus on next Winter Olympics, in 2018, in South Korea.

headline.main: Watching Doping Scandal, Fourth-Place Olympian Asks, ‘Am I a Bronze Medalist?’

docs.snippet: The Boston Red Sox acquired All-Star Drew Pomeranz from the San Diego Padres on Thursday night, adding a third left-hander to the rotation as they push to return to the playoffs after consecutive last-place finishes....

docs.snippet: Fans celebrating Bastille Day created dramas at the Tour de France, causing a crash involving race leader Chris Froome that ensured it wasn't until hours after the 12th stage concluded that organizers decided the British rider could keep the yello...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fans celebrating Bastille Day created dramas at the Tour de France, causing a crash involving race leader Chris Froome that ensured it wasn't until hours after the 12th stage concluded that organizers decided the British rider could keep the yellow jersey.

headline.main: Froome Keeps the Yellow Jersey After Dramatic Tour Stage
headline.print_headline: Froome Keeps the Yellow Jersey After Dramatic Tour Stage

docs.snippet: The city’s Landmarks Commission voted to study whether the giant sign that guides drivers, marathon runners and Red Sox fans should receive special status....
docs.lead_paragraph: The city’s Landmarks Commission voted to study whether the giant sign that guides drivers, marathon runners and Red Sox fans should receive special status.
docs.abstract: Boston Landmarks Commission votes to study whether iconic Citgo sign in Kenmore Square deserves official landmark status; question has gained urgency as building below sign is up for sale.

headline.main: Boston Takes Step to Elevate Citgo Sign From LED Beacon to Landmark
headline.print_headline: Boston Moves to Make Guiding Beacon an Official Landmark
